TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeLib

summary.span: 提供 接口的托管定义。

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 `ITypeLib` 接口的其他信息，请参阅 MSDN Library。For additional information about the `ITypeLib` interface, see the MSDN Library. 当本机代码中的 COM 方法返回 HRESULT 时，公共语言运行时将引发异常。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 有关更多信息，请参见 [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](/dotnet/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](/dotnet/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions).

abstract member FindName : string * int * System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo[] * int[] * int16 -> unit

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void FindName(string szNameBuf, int32 lHashVal, [out] class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo[] ppTInfo, [out] int32[] rgMemId, int16& pcFound) cil managed

param.name: szNameBuf
param.span: 要搜索的名称。

span.span: The name to search for.

param.span: 这是一个输入/输出参数。

span.span: This is an in/out parameter.

param.name: lHashVal
param.span: 一个用于加快搜索速度的哈希值，由 函数计算。

span.span: A hash value to speed up the search, computed by the function.

param.span: 如果 为 0，则计算一个值。

span.span: If is 0, a value is computed.

param.name: ppTInfo
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个指向类型说明的指针数组，这些类型说明中包含 中指定的名称。

span.span: When this method returns, contains an array of pointers to the type descriptions that contain the name specified in .

param.span: 此参数在传递时尚未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: rgMemId
param.span: 所找到的项的 数组；[i] 是由 [i] 指定的类型说明中建立索引的 。

span.span: An array of the 's of the found items; [i] is the that indexes into the type description specified by [i].

param.span: 不能为 。

span.span: Cannot be .

param.name: pcFound
param.span: 在进入时指示要查找的实例数。

span.span: On entry, indicates how many instances to look for.

param.span: 例如，可以调用 = 1 以查找第一个匹配项。

span.span: For example, = 1 can be called to find the first occurrence.

param.span: 找到一个实例时停止搜索。

span.span: The search stops when one instance is found.

param.span: 在退出时指示找到的实例数。

span.span: On exit, indicates the number of instances that were found.

param.span: 如果 的 和 值完全相同，则可能存在其他包含此名称的类型说明。

span.span: If the and values of are identical, there might be more type descriptions that contain the name.

summary.span: 在类型库中查找类型说明的匹配项。

span.span: Finds occurrences of a type description in a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rgMemId` 参数中必须有足够的空间来容纳 `pcFound` 条目。There must be enough room in the `rgMemId` parameter to hold `pcFound` entries. 如果类型库包含由 `szNameBuf` 参数指定的名称，则使用类型库中找到的大小写将 `szNameBuf` 替换为类型库中的名称。If the type library contains the name specified by the `szNameBuf` parameter, `szNameBuf` is overwritten with the name found in the type library, using the casing found in the type library. 例如，如果类型库包含名称 "aBc" 并且 方法将 "abc" 作为 `szNameBuf` 参数传递，则当该方法返回时，`szNameBuf` 将变为 "aBc"。For example, if type library contains the name "aBc" and the method passes "abc" as the `szNameBuf` parameter, `szNameBuf` becomes "aBc" when the method returns. 有关 `ITypeLib::FindName`的其他信息，请参阅 MSDN Library。For additional information about `ITypeLib::FindName`, see the MSDN Library.

param.name: strName

span.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the name of the specified item.

param.span: 此参数在传递时尚未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: strDocString
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个表示指定项的文档字符串的字符串。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the documentation string for the specified item.

param.span: 此参数在传递时尚未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: dwHelpContext
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含与指定项关联的帮助上下文标识符。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the Help context identifier associated with the specified item.

param.span: 此参数在传递时尚未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: strHelpFile
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个表示帮助文件的完全限定名的字符串。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the fully qualified name of the Help file.

param.span: 此参数在传递时尚未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 检索库的文档字符串、完整的帮助文件名和路径以及帮助文件中的库帮助主题的上下文标识符。

span.span: Retrieves the library's documentation string, the complete Help file name and path, and the context identifier for the library Help topic in the Help file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 `ITypeLib::GetDocumentation`的其他信息，请参阅 MSDN Library。For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetDocumentation`, see the MSDN Library.

returns.span: 如果在类型库中找到 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if was found in the type library; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类型库包含由 `szNameBuf` 参数指定的字符串，则使用类型库中找到的大小写将 `szNameBuf` 替换为类型库中的名称。If the type library contains the string specified by the `szNameBuf` parameter, `szNameBuf` is overwritten with the name found in the type library, using the casing found in the type library. 例如，如果类型库包含字符串 "aBc" 并且 方法将 "abc" 作为 `szNameBuf` 参数传递，则当该方法返回时，`szNameBuf` 将变为 "aBc"。For example, if the type library contains the string "aBc" and the method passes "abc" as the `szNameBuf` parameter, `szNameBuf` becomes "aBc" when the method returns. 有关 `ITypeLib::IsName`的其他信息，请参阅 MSDN Library。For additional information about `ITypeLib::IsName`, see the MSDN Library.
